settings.title: Following the sun
settings.title2: From rooftop kits to outdoor design, we light the way.

settings.descripcion:
Free Personalized Guidance to Maximize Your Purchase

Not sure which products to choose or how to create a functional and well-lit outdoor space?

Our personalized guide helps you optimize your order and avoid common mistakes — completely free when your purchase reaches a minimum of $400.

What’s Included

  • Expert review of your cart before checkout
  • Suggestions tailored to your space (patio, garden, entrance, etc.)
  • Tips on styling and installation
  • Recommendations based on climate, aesthetic and efficiency

How It Works

If your order exceeds the minimum required amount of $400, this service is activated automatically. You'll receive your personalized guide via WhatsApp or email within 24 to 48 hours.

Benefits

  • Smarter and more confident purchase decisions
  • Save time and avoid unnecessary spending
  • Better overall results — without paying for extra consultations

Technical Analysis of Your Energy Use and the Ideal Solar System

If you’re considering adding solar panels to your home, this service offers a detailed and professional assessment to help you make confident decisions.

What’s Included

  • Monthly consumption analysis (bills and usage habits)
  • Estimation of required panels and inverter types
  • Simulation of monthly savings and return on investment
  • Site review (orientation, shading, available roof space)
  • Technical report with clear, actionable recommendations

Who It’s For

Designed for homeowners building or renovating, who want to reduce energy costs and gain more independence from the grid.

Benefits

  • Avoid oversizing or undersizing your solar system
  • Maximize your investment from the very beginning
  • Get a clear, personalized action plan to move forward

Aesthetic and Functional Transformation of Your Outdoor Space with Solar Lighting

If your terrace, garden, or entrance doesn't reflect the atmosphere you want, this service helps you create a visually harmonious, functional, and energy-efficient environment.

What’s Included

  • Visual analysis of your space (via photos, sketches, or video)
  • Strategic layout of solar lighting points
  • Product recommendations (model and quantity)
  • Custom aesthetic proposal tailored to your needs
  • Optional render as visual inspiration

Who It’s For

Perfect for homeowners, Airbnb hosts, architects, or anyone looking to enhance the value and beauty of their outdoor areas.

Benefits

  • Safer, more balanced and functional outdoor spaces
  • Enhanced aesthetic value without construction work
  • Optimized use of solar lighting products

Energy-Efficient Home Designs, Ready for the Future

We design homes with smart layouts, low energy consumption, and high comfort. This service is ideal for anyone looking to build with modern, functional, and eco-conscious principles.

What’s Included

  • Core architectural concept tailored to your needs
  • Optimized space distribution for daily functionality
  • Passive lighting and ventilation strategies
  • Recommendations for sustainable and efficient materials
  • Foundational document ready for project development

Who It’s For

Perfect for homeowners, developers, and families planning to build a modern and comfortable home aligned with sustainable values.

Benefits

  • Energy savings starting from the design phase
  • Increased thermal and lighting comfort
  • Reduced long-term environmental impact

Complete Installation Management to Get You Up and Running from Day One

If you already have your solar equipment but need help ensuring a correct and safe installation, we coordinate the entire process with certified technicians.

What’s Included

  • Sourcing qualified installers in your area
  • Coordinating the full installation schedule
  • Remote supervision of the process
  • Quality checklist and warranty verification
  • Post-installation support to ensure everything works perfectly

Who It’s For

Ideal for anyone who wants a worry-free solar installation, handled by professionals, with full support and oversight.

Benefits

  • Guaranteed safe and professional installation
  • Total peace of mind throughout the process
  • Step-by-step guidance until your system is fully operational
